Room.Name: Countess Brianna's Chambers
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the secret chambers of Countess Brianna.
Room.LongDescription: Countess Brianna has long since thought to have been destroyed as a vampire, as she hasn't been seen for ages. Unfortunately, it appears that she has just been hibernating until she could regain enough strength to re-enter the world of the living. There is a large coffin in the center of the room which is used by the Countess when she is resting. Since the Labyrinth is so far underground, she doesn't really need to escape from the light of the sun since it never really gets down this far.
